timeline.bodyText: toXContent for the agg provider should only provide the agg map. This test is to make sure that we appropriate write between nodes of various versions.

timeline.bodyText:
If there are no datafeed configs, that also means there won't be any updates.
This is ok, as all new datafeed configs enforce the appropriate date_histogram agg format.
timeline.author: benwtrent

timeline.bodyText: It's bad practice to pass a reference to this to some other service before the object is fully constructed.  There is currently a drive to refactor code where this is done - see #38560 - so it would be best not to add any more cases of this.  You'll have to add an extra method to add this to the listener once the constructor returns, for example see https://github.com/elastic/elasticsearch/pull/45517/files
timeline.author: droberts195

timeline.bodyText: When I saw this method name at the point of use it confused me enough that I had to look at the definition.  Therefore it might be clearer to rename it to isMinNodeVersionSupported.
